body: Bother me when this Gets Translated Imma go take a Nap for 3 weeks

At the the Haruki asks if he's just acting like ho, basically. Sensei says no but is obviously confused about why he's being so proactive to the point of some total sex freakiness. Haruki senses the reaction and gets really embarrassed for misunderstanding what he thinks sensei wants. He thought doing that would make him happy, but he thinks it made sensei mad instead. Obviously Sensei isn't mad, he just isn't sure if this is what Haruki REALLY wants (it is), and him questioning that at this point gave Haruki the wrong idea.
The next one will be the final chapter
